price: (Qur’aan) woi yε asεm no ho dawubͻ dema adasamma sεdeε wͻde bεbͻ wͻn ho kͻkͻ, na wͻ’de behunu sε Ɔne Awurade Baako, na nnipa mu mmadwemmafoᴐ no nso de bεto wͻn adwene mu.
arabic: هَٰذَا بَلَٰغٞ لِّلنَّاسِ وَلِيُنذَرُواْ بِهِۦ وَلِيَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا هُوَ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞ وَلِيَذَّكَّرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: hādhā balāghun lilnnāsi waliyundharū bihi waliyaʿlamū annamā huwa ilāhun wāḥidun waliyadhakkara ulū al-albābi
